shortdesc.ph: Gets the video frame from multiple channels.

section.p: After successfully registering the video observer, if you set the return value of to, the SDK will trigger the callback when the video data in each channel is captured and send the video data to you.
You can process the video data retrieved from this callback according to your scenario, and send the processed data back to the SDK using the `videoFrame` parameter in this callback.
section.note: @note This callback does not support sending RGBA video data back to the SDK.

plentry.pd: The name of the channel where the video frame is located.
The ID of the user who sent the frame of video.

section.title: Returns
